article_title: Dear Mrs. Obama, Why I Gave Up My U.S. Citizenship

article_metadata.description: Americans are renouncing U.S. citizenship like never before. One Canadian American writes Mrs. Obama why she is now just Canadian and won't look back.
article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood
